Koschade's Jemaah Islamiyah (2002 Bali Bombings)

Source: R/data-jemmah_islamiyah.R
jemmah_islamiyah.Rd

jemmah_islamiyah is an adaptation of the UCINET dataset "Jemaah Islamiyah Koschade". 

jemmah_islamiyah

Format

  • Object Class: igraph

    • directed: FALSE

    • bipartite: FALSE

    • multiplex: FALSE

    • vertices: 17

    • edges: 63

    • loops: FALSE

  • Vertex Attributes:

    • name

      • character representing each persons's name.

  • Edge Attributes:

    • weight

      • numeric describing the strength of relations between individuals, ranging from 1 to 5.

        • 1 refers to a weak relationship, such as a single text message or financial transaction.

        • 5 refers to a strong relationship, such as individuals who resided together or individuals who had numerous weak contacts over the period in question.

Source

https://sites.google.com/site/ucinetsoftware/datasets/covert-networks/jemaahislamiyahkoschade

Details

From the UCINET documentation:

Jemaah Islamiyah cell that was responsible for the Bali bombings in 2002 – i.e. should tally with the other Bali bombing dataset from JJATT. The recording of the interaction of the cell began following the meeting in the Hotel Harem in Denpasar on October 6, when the group was considered to go ‘operationally covert’, and concluded when the majority of the group had left Bali before the implementation of the operation on October 11, 2002.

References

Koschade, Stuart (2006) A Social Network Analysis of Jemaah Islamiyah: The Applications to Counter-Terrorism and Intelligence. Studies in Conflict and Terrorism Vol. 29(6):pp. 559-575

International Crisis Group. 2003 ‘Jemaah Islamiyah in South East Asia: Damaged but Still Dangerous’

Examples

library(snatools)

jemmah_islamiyah
#> IGRAPH 742cf84 UNW- 17 63 -- 
#> + attr: .vrt_id (v/n), name (v/c), .edg_id (e/n), weight (e/n)
#> + edges from 742cf84 (vertex names):
#>  [1] MUKLAS --AMROZI   MUKLAS --IMRON    MUKLAS --SAMUDRA  MUKLAS --DULMATIN
#>  [5] MUKLAS --IDRIS    MUKLAS --AZAHARI  MUKLAS --GHONI    MUKLAS --PATEK   
#>  [9] MUKLAS --SARIJO   AMROZI --SAMUDRA  AMROZI --IDRIS    AMROZI --MUBAROK 
#> [13] IMRON  --SAMUDRA  IMRON  --DULMATIN IMRON  --IDRIS    IMRON  --AZAHARI 
#> [17] IMRON  --GHONI    IMRON  --PATEK    IMRON  --FERI     IMRON  --SARIJO  
#> [21] SAMUDRA--DULMATIN SAMUDRA--IDRIS    SAMUDRA--MUBAROK  SAMUDRA--AZAHARI 
#> [25] SAMUDRA--GHONI    SAMUDRA--ARNASAN  SAMUDRA--RAUF     SAMUDRA--OCTAVIA 
#> [29] SAMUDRA--HIDAYAT  SAMUDRA--JUNAEDI  SAMUDRA--PATEK    SAMUDRA--SARIJO  
#> + ... omitted several edges

as_network(jemmah_islamiyah)
#>  Network attributes:
#>   vertices = 17 
#>   directed = FALSE 
#>   hyper = FALSE 
#>   loops = FALSE 
#>   multiple = FALSE 
#>   bipartite = FALSE 
#>   total edges= 63 
#>     missing edges= 0 
#>     non-missing edges= 63 
#> 
#>  Vertex attribute names: 
#>     .vrt_id vertex.names 
#> 
#>  Edge attribute names: 
#>     .edg_id weight
